attributes.action: NOT accede to a petition asking him to discriminate against asylum seekers and immigrants by making ONLY THEM added compulsorily to the organ donor list
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I agree that organ donation should be opt-out rather than opt-in but surely asylum seekers and immigrants should be as entitled as anyone else to opt-out.  This petition is in opposition to one which asks for it to be compulsory for asylum seekers and immigrants to be added permanently to the organ donor list; as I've pointed out, MANY times, those of us who were born here did nothing to ensure this - it was just "the luck of the draw" - so why should people who, through no fault of their own, were NOT born here, be penalised in any way?

rejection.details: Please refrain from making direct references to other petitions. It is enough to make a counter-request.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
